contexts.context: ...the smallest Power might, in legal Theory, <mark>cover</mark> these Transactions, but, where the Property is...
..., so used in fraud, would be no <mark>Cover</mark>, and the Property thus masked would be condemned...
...and none of their Flags can be made to <mark>cover</mark> the fraudulent Transaction; the immediate effect of which...
...and the cruelties to which such fraudulent use gives <mark>cover</mark>, are generally unknown in that Country. It...
...shall be found making use of such Flag to <mark>cover</mark> a Trade in Slaves.
